metadata.name: Potential COM Objects Download Cradles Usage - PS Script
metadata.comment: Detects usage of COM objects that can be abused to download files in PowerShell by CLSID

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[type]::gettypefromclsid(')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0002df01-0000-0000-c000-000000000046')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('f6d90f16-9c73-11d3-b32e-00c04f990bb4')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('f5078f35-c551-11d3-89b9-0000f81fe221')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('88d96a0a-f192-11d4-a65f-0040963251e5')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('afba6b42-5692-48ea-8141-dc517dcf0ef1')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('afb40ffd-b609-40a3-9828-f88bbe11e4e3')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('88d96a0b-f192-11d4-a65f-0040963251e5')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('2087c2f4-2cef-4953-a8ab-66779b670495')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('000209ff-0000-0000-c000-000000000046')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('00024500-0000-0000-c000-000000000046'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of COM objects that can be abused to download files in PowerShell by CLSID
